messages.zh: 第二十八关（后）
messages.en: level 28(post)
No……

messages.zh: 不可能！不可能......！
messages.en: This can’t be! This can’t be……!

messages.zh: 别，别让米莎看见，这......
messages.en: Don’t, don’t let Misha see this, this……

messages.zh: 快让那几个懂急救的过来！
messages.en: Get those ones who know about emergency treatment here!

messages.zh: 可恶，梅菲斯特为什么不肯来，他在干什么！
messages.en: Damn it, why won’t Mephisto come, what is he doing!

messages.zh: 如果他在的话，我们能救回很多人啊！
messages.en: If he is here, we could have saved many of them!

messages.zh: 指望那个不重视同伴的家伙，有点不太现实吧。
messages.en: Counting on that guy who’s got no compassion for allies, that’s pretty unrealistic.

messages.zh: 没办法的事情，别太自责。
messages.en: It can’t be helped, don’t blame yourselves.

messages.zh: 谢谢你掩护我们，W......至少，我们把他带回来了。
messages.en: Thanks for covering us, W……at least, we brought him back.

messages.zh: 感谢要用实际行动哦。
messages.en: Gratitude needs to be expressed with action.

messages.zh: 当然。我们会掩护你撤退......只是，有一个请求——
messages.en: Of course. We’ll cover you when you retreat……but there is one request——

messages.zh: 请一定保护好米莎。
messages.en: Please do keep Misha safe.

messages.zh: 那是当然，毕竟——
messages.en: That’s for sure, after all——

messages.zh: 毕竟我还有利用价值，是吗？
messages.en: I’m still of use to you, right?

messages.zh: ......让我和碎骨单独待会儿吧。我来照看他。
messages.en: ……Leave me and Bone Breaker alone. I’ll take care of him.
But……
……Alright.

messages.zh: W，说好了。你一定要做到。
messages.en: W, you promised us. You have to keep your words.

messages.zh: 好的好的~
messages.en: Okay okay~

messages.zh: 我说的是让我和碎骨单独待会儿。
messages.en: I said leave me and Bone Breaker alone.

messages.zh: 可是你该走了。
messages.en: But it’s time for you to go.

messages.zh: 过不了多久，龙门和罗德岛就会攻进来。
messages.en: In a short while, Lungmen and Rhodes Island are going to breakin.

messages.zh: 这些殿后的整合运动也会死去吧。
messages.en: Those Reunion Movement bringing up the rear will most likely die as well.

messages.zh: 啊呀啊呀，真麻烦。
messages.en: Oh my oh my, what a mess.

messages.zh: 米莎，因为你身上这一把密钥——就要死那么多人。真是遗憾。
messages.en: Misha, because of this key on you——so many people are going to die. Such a pity.

messages.zh: 你开始让我感到厌烦了，W。
messages.en: You're starting to annoy me, W.

messages.zh: 你是没法从我这里拿到任何东西的。
messages.en: You won’t be able to get anything from me.

messages.zh: 哇哇，好可怕~
messages.en: Wow wow, how terrifying~

messages.zh: 毕竟密钥和你的生命是一体的嘛。
messages.en: After all, the key is bounded with your life.

messages.zh: 虽然那边那个陈长官还不知道——她可不会对任何人手下留情哦。
messages.en: Although officer Ch’en over there doesn’t know yet——she won’t show mercy to anyone.

messages.zh: 现在和我走还来得及，尽管——要放着这些整合运动自生自灭......
messages.en: There’s still time to go with me, despite——having to leave those Reunion Movement to their deaths……

messages.zh: 还要让碎骨在这慢慢变冷~
messages.en: And letting Bone Breaker turn cold here~

messages.zh: 住口！
messages.en: Shut up!

messages.zh: 我只是说了实话。
messages.en: I’m just speaking the truth.

messages.zh: 毕竟，这里已经毫无希望了呢~
messages.en: After all, there is no hope left here~

messages.zh: 不。
messages.en: No.

messages.zh: 我一定会救活他。
messages.en: I’ll bring him back.

messages.zh: 碎骨不会死......碎骨是不会死的。
messages.en: Bone Breaker won’t die……Bone Breaker will not die.

messages.zh: 他一定会保护大家......保护所有人。
messages.en: He will protect everyone……protect every one of us.
I have to……
